name: react-components
description: React components for Brightlayer UI applications

scripts.install:dependencies: cd demos/showcase && yarn && cd ../../docs && yarn && cd ../components && yarn
scripts.start:showcase: yarn initialize && yarn install:dependencies && yarn link:components && cd demos/showcase && yarn start
scripts.start:reactdev: yarn install:dependencies && yarn link:components && cd docs && yarn start
scripts.prettier: prettier "*.{json,css,scss,html,md}" --write && cd components && yarn prettier && cd ../demos/showcase && yarn prettier && cd ../../docs && yarn prettier
scripts.prettier:check: prettier "*.{json,css,scss,html,md}" --check && cd components && yarn prettier:check && cd ../demos/showcase && yarn prettier:check && cd ../../docs && yarn prettier
scripts.precommit: yarn initialize && yarn install:dependencies && yarn prettier && yarn lint && yarn test && yarn build && yarn test:artifacts && yarn generate:licenses
scripts.publish:package: cd dist && rm -f *.tgz && set npm_config_yes=true && npx -p @brightlayer-ui/publish blui-publish

author: Brightlayer UI <brightlayer-ui@eaton.com>
